Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 17/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
